group_1.textRight: [chara:300401:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]What?! Mitama?!
You! [chara:101301:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:101301:motion_200][chara:101301:cheek_0][chara:101301:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:101301:lipSynch_1]You look...positively beautiful!

group_1.textLeft: Oh, stop it, you! Describing me as some sort@of princess... It's too much!

group_1.textRight: That's not what she said...

group_1.textLeft: Did you guys come here to see the@Coordinator?

group_1.textRight: Yes, um, but not for the usual reason.
We were worried, so we came to check on you.
But it looks like you're doing fine!
You do!

group_1.textLeft: You came all this way just for that...

group_1.textRight: It isn't any trouble.
Besides, we got to see your splendid New@Year's decor! Very impressive!
Here, have some of this if you like.
I thought you might be busy today, so I@picked up some things to eat.

group_1.textLeft: Hey, we brought some of those too!@[chara:101001:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:101001:cheek_0][chara:101001:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:101001:lipSynch_1]Puddin' and jellies...

group_1.textRight: Oh!
We should all get together to do this then!

group_1.textLeft: What?

group_1.textRight: The kimono wasn't the only present we had@planned.

group_1.textLeft: What else did you...

group_1.textRight: TaDA!
Check this out!

group_1.textLeft: Oh? You brought stuff for hand-rolled sushi?

group_1.textRight: Yes!
It's still a little early to eat New Year's@food, so we prepared sushi instead!
We brought all kinds of ingredients so you@can make them how you like.

group_1.textLeft: I'm...so happy!
(Everyone put so much thought into this,@for my sake!)
[chara:111700:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Thank you, everyone!

group_1.textRight: You're welcome!
We're the ones who should be thanking you!

group_1.textLeft: (All these gifts for me...)
(I'm so unbelievably happy!)

group_1.textRight: The time really flies when you're having@this much fun.

group_1.textLeft: It really does.
It's getting late, so we should start heading@home.

group_1.textRight: I agree!
Thanks so much for everything you've done@for us this year, Mitama.

group_1.textLeft: And here's to another great year!

group_1.textRight: Ahh, everything tasted so good!
We hope we'll get to see you lots next year,@too!

group_1.textLeft: Heh, we'll be back before ya know it.
See ya round, Coordinator.
We'll come by after New Year's Day!

group_1.textRight: See ya later, Mitama!

group_1.textLeft: Um, Happy New Year!

group_1.textRight: Place an order for some Chinese food for@New Year's and I'll bring it right over!

group_1.textLeft: We'll be counting on you next year too.

group_1.textCenter: (It's a lot quieter now that everyone left@all at once...and a little lonely.)
(I didn't know rolling sushi all together@could be so entertaining.)
(And here I was thinking I'd have to cook@all the New Year's dishes myself.)
(It'd be a good idea to host a potluck@dinner sometime!)
Though of course, I'll be making my own@spread for New Year's tooâ™ª

group_1.narration: I am Mitama Yakumo.@I'm a very happy Coordinator,@surrounded by kind and loving friends.
I spent the end of the year cleaning and@decorating, and I'll start off the new one@with a holiday party and a shrine visit.

group_1.textCenter: I have a feeling the new year is going to@be wonderful!
(As long as I have everyone with me.)
This year will be good to me.@I just have a feeling.
